data.field: *nix vs. Windows Vi vs. Emacs Perl vs. Python Gnome vs. KDE Big Endian vs. Little Endian K&R vs. Allman Tabs vs. Spaces Cuddled vs. Uncuddled Static vs. Dynamic Mark-and-Sweep vs. Refcounting $language is really OO vs. No, it isn't ...waged against the authors of polls with too few choices.
